nodes.text: A B1 battle droid served in the droid army of the Confederacy of Independent Systems during the Clone Wars. He was stationed on Rugosa during a battle in 22 BBY.

This droid was among the ground forces sent out to find Jedi Master Yoda. He was briefed prior by Sith apprentice Asajj Ventress. After asking what the Jedi looks like, he told Ventress the droids would take care of him. However, during their encounter with Yoda and the three clone troopers that accompanied him, this droid was destroyed along with his companions.
Like all B1 battle droids, he stood at 1.93 meters tall and had masculine programing. He sported bone-white colored plating and was equipped with an E-5 blaster rifle.

His first and only appearance was in "Ambush", the first episode of the animated television series Star Wars: The Clone Wars' first season, which originally aired on October 3, 2008. He was voiced by Matthew Wood.
